pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.3.19: bibbohanaṃ → bimbohanaṃ (bj, s1-3, pts1), parasu → pharasu (bj, s1-3, pts1)
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:2.9: ānanda → honti te ānanda (bj) | honti yevānanda (s1) | hontiyevānanda (s2, s3)
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:2.14: sama­nug­gāhīya­māno → sama­nug­gāhiya­māno (bj, s1-3), asama­nug­gāhīya­māno → asama­nug­gāhiya­māno (bj, s1-3)
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.8.115: Ekamūlakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ → ekamūlakaṃ saṅkhittaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ (s1-3) | ekamūlakaṃ (pts1)
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.1.8: pubbevassa hoti musā bhaṇissanti, bhaṇantassa hoti musā bhaṇāmīti, bhaṇitassa hoti musā mayā bhaṇitanti. → etthantare pātho cha1-2 potthakesu
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.2.7: vituḍenti → vitudanti (bj) | vitudenti vitacchenti virājenti (s1-3) | vitudenti (pts1)
pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.2: vitacchenti vibhajjenti → vitacchenti virājenti (bj) | vitudenti vitacchenti virājenti (s1-3) | vitacchenti vibhajenti (pts1)
